title: Kiki RPG Premium v1.0.3 Android
description:
Kiki RPG: Premium v1.0.3
Requirements: Android 2.1 and up
Overview: A new, beautifully rendered action RPG from the makers of the highly acclaimed Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½Exitium: Saviors of VardoniaÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½. This cutely styled and wonderfully crafted RPG gives you the chance to utilize the powers of different creatures in your fight against a monstrous, re-awaking force of evil...


The land has been at peace for fourteen years, since the defeat and banishment of the Demon King. Young KiKiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s parents, who were among the group of legendary Heroes that went to face the Demon King, never returned. But the peace is becoming increasingly uneasy; creatures are beginning to terrorise peaceful townsfolk and villagers, and there are rumors of an ancient evil emerging in a distant land.
Join KiKi on her adventures to find her missing parents and defeat the emerging threat, and, in the process, become the Hero sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s always wanted to be.
FEATURES 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Acquire and tame the souls of creatures and use their powers! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Utilize the powers of the animals: Rat, Ox, Tiger, Rabbit, Dragon, Snake, Horse, Sheep, Monkey, Rooster, Wolf, Pig! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Take care of your tamed souls or they might leave you! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Make traps and bombs to aid your battles! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Ride your Landmate! Magical transportation! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Ranches allow you to breed animals! Passive and active skill to build! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Mine ore, gather herbs, raise animals and collect trees! Hire assistants to help you collect natural items. 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Find NPCs that can help you on your quest! Cute and crazy characters will help or hinder your adventure! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Strange, wonderful and fearsome creatures and monsters to battle. 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Cook your meals out in the field with ingredients you find on your travels! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Create, strengthen and customize your own weapons, tool, traps and bombs! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Fabricate newer and more powerful weapons and equipment! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Crush unwanted items and use the powder to make newer, more useful items! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Intensify to strengthen weapons and equipment you already have! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Teleport around using magic boxes! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Explore many, colorful, challenging landscapes! Cute and charming graphics and animations. 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Fun and funny quests and side missions! 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Massive amount of items in the online store.
